channel.title: CVE Feed for Mark Kinchin -- Beds24 Online Booking
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Mark Kinchin -- Beds24 Online Booking

item.title: CVE-2023-52228|2024-08-02T22:55:41.468Z -- mark%20kinchin -- beds24%20online%20booking
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Mark Kinchin Beds24 Online Booking allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Beds24 Online Booking: from n/a through 2.0.24.
